content.rendered:
Chiropractic Care

Chiropractic care is a form of alternative medicine that focuses on diagnosing and treating musculoskeletal disorders. Our chiropractor at Tropea Chiropractic Inc in Sunnyvale, CA, uses various techniques to improve the function of the joints, muscles, and nerves. Studies show that chiropractic care can effectively treat back pain, neck pain, headaches, and other musculoskeletal conditions.

Types of Chiropractic Care Techniques

There are various forms of chiropractic treatments. They include:

Spinal Adjustments

Spinal adjustment is the most common chiropractic treatment. It involves the chiropractor using their hands or a device to apply pressure and movement to the spinal column. Spinal adjustment helps realign the spine and improve function.

Massage Therapy

Massage therapy is a technique that uses pressure and hands-on manipulation to help improve blood flow and relieve muscle tension. It is often used in combination with chiropractic adjustments.

Mobilization

Mobilization is a chiropractic treatment that uses movement and pressure to help improve joint function. It is used to treat conditions such as arthritis.

Trigger Point Therapy

Trigger point therapy focuses on releasing trigger points, which are areas of muscle tension that can cause pain. Trigger point therapy treats neck pain, back pain, and headaches.

Electrical Stimulation

This chiropractic treatment uses electrical current to help improve nerve function and relieve pain. It is often used to treat conditions such as carpal tunnel syndrome.

Acupuncture

Acupuncture is a form of traditional Chinese medicine that involves using needles to stimulate specific points on the body. Acupuncture is used to treat pain and other health conditions.

Conditions Treated

You can use chiropractic care to treat a variety of conditions, including:

Back Pain

Chiropractic care is an effective treatment for back pain. It can help to realign the spine and improve function.

Neck Pain

Chiropractic care can help to relieve neck pain by realigning the spine and improving function. It helps deal with whiplash injuries, tension headaches, and other neck-related conditions.

Headaches

Chiropractic care can help relieve tension, headaches, and migraines by realigning the spine and improving function.

Carpal Tunnel Syndrome

Chiropractic care can help relieve carpal tunnel syndrome symptoms by improving nerve function and reducing pain.

Arthritis

Arthritis is a condition that causes inflammation and pain in the joints. Chiropractic care can help to reduce inflammation and pain and improve joint function.

Scoliosis

Scoliosis is a condition that causes the spine to curve to one side. Chiropractic care can help to improve posture and alignment and reduce pain.

Fibromyalgia

Fibromyalgia is a condition that causes widespread pain and fatigue. Chiropractic care can help to improve pain and fatigue and improve function.

Schedule an Appointment with Our Chiropractor in Sunnyvale, CA

If you are experiencing pain or discomfort, chiropractic care may be the solution for you. Visit us today at Tropea Chiropractic Inc in Sunnyvale, CA, or call us at (408) 329-9604 to schedule a consultation with our chiropractor.
